name: Morph
description:
Escape the office by navigate two worlds through drinking.

WSAD: Movement
Space: Jump
Left Mouse Click: Interaction

1st prize winner at the GCC Game Jam.
Also won the technical award.
48 hour game jam.

Team Members:
Abdullah Konash
Ammar Al-Sharikh
Mohammad Al-Arkobi
Tariq Mukhtar

Game Jam Theme: Fantasy
